triples.name: Agent-based model
triples.relevance: Core methodology that the paper surveys in combination with large language models for modeling complex systems.

triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: The central technology being integrated with agent-based modeling to enhance simulation capabilities.

triples.name: Complex system
triples.relevance: The type of systems that agent-based modeling is designed to understand and simulate.

triples.name: Machine perception
triples.relevance: Addresses one of the key challenges in LLM-empowered agent-based simulation: environment perception.

triples.name: Action selection
triples.relevance: Relates to the action generation challenge discussed in the survey for determining agent behavior.

triples.name: Intelligent agent
triples.relevance: The fundamental entity in agent-based modeling that interacts autonomously to create emergent system behaviors.

triples.name: Simulation
triples.relevance: Core computational technique used throughout the paper for modeling and testing agent-based systems.

triples.name: Automated planning and scheduling
triples.relevance: Related to action generation and decision-making processes in agents as discussed in the survey.
